task_background: Prepare the warehouse for an upcoming shipment of participation trophies by organizing, repairing, and cleaning the facility.

tasks.task_description: Place the cracked mug (mug_1) on the stained coffee table (coffee_table_1).
Place the coffee-stained clipboard (clipboard_1) on the adjustable workbench (workbench_1).
Find the heaviest, metal trophy base (metal_bases_crate_1) and move it to the assembly floor.
Find the only flashing red device (trophy_mold_1) and place it on the inspection table.
Repair the broken weighing scale (weighing_scale_1) using the wrench (wrench_1).
Repair the jammed conveyor belt (conveyor_belt_1) using the screwdriver (screwdriver_1).
Use the soldering iron (soldering_iron_1) to repair the frozen robotic arm (robotic_arm_1).
Use the welding torch (welding_torch_1) to repair the injection molding machine (injection_molding_machine_1).
Have robot_1 and robot_2 cooperate to open the locked ribbon cabinet (ribbon_cabinet_1).
Move the heavy steel loading ramp (loading_ramp_1) to the storage area.
Move the heavy shipping crate maze (shipping_crate_maze_1) to the loading dock.
Cooperatively move the heavy injection molding machine (injection_molding_machine_1) to the repair bay and repair it using the welding torch (welding_torch_1).
Cooperatively move the heavy conveyor belt (conveyor_belt_1) to the repair bay and repair it using the screwdriver (screwdriver_1).
